modName: Calaval Cave for Lord Hauns Magicka Sabers
summary:
THIS MOD REQUIRES MAGICA SABERS BY LORD HAUN. Load my mod after Magica Sabers.

Calaval Cave - Uses Magicka sabers by Lord Haun get that here (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3174)

Adds a dungeon (still in beta coc calavalcave to reach it)
descriptionHtml:
Calaval Cave - Uses Magicka sabers by Lord Haun get that here (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3174)

Adds a dungeon to recover Magicka sabers without having to unlock the daedric smithing perk.
Also good for an alternative start.

HOW TO CREATE ALTERNATE START:
Create a text file in the main skyrim directory called start, not start.txt, but just start. Open it with notepad and add these lines.

player.removeallitems
;add tunic
player.additem 0003c9fe 1
;remove spells
player.removespell 00012fcd
player.removespell 00012fcc
;Create Character
showracemenu

Save and close. At the skyrim main menu, open console and type
"coc calavalcave" without quotes. The with console open type. EDIT: Fixed syntax

"bat start"

Have fun with your new character. Remember if you want to start the main quest you must use the console. UESP.net is a source of good info for that.

The ultimate goal of this mod is to add a small story for use with Lord Haun's Magicka Sabers.
Also, as you explore, a story will reveal itself as to how Magica Sabers had come to the planet of Nirn.
author: UAL002 and Lord Haun

files.name: Calaval Cave 1_2
files.changelogHtml: Finalized the cell which will hopefully allow followers to follow.
